snippet: The Vatican said Thursday that it had proposed granting special legal status a to breakaway group as part of a continued effort on the part of Pope Benedict XVI toward reconciliation.
abstract: Vatican says that it has proposed granting the Society of St Pius X a special legal status as part of a continued effort on the part of Pope Benedict XVI toward reconciliation with the breakaway traditionalist group.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican said Thursday that it had proposed granting special legal status a to breakaway group as part of a continued effort on the part of Pope Benedict XVI toward reconciliation.

headline.seo: The Vatican: Reconciliation Bid for Society of St. Pius X
